trans-unit.source: Understand the Server Rules

seg-source.mrk: Understand the Server Rules

target.mrk: Comprendre les règles du serveur

trans-unit.source: About Server Rules

seg-source.mrk: About Server Rules

target.mrk: À propos des règles du serveur

trans-unit.source: The diagram (<MadCap:xref href="#A_tree_structure_consisting_of_two_paths." class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) contains two paths:

seg-source.mrk: The diagram (<MadCap:xref href="#A_tree_structure_consisting_of_two_paths." class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) contains two paths:

target.mrk: Le diagramme (<MadCap:xref href="#A_tree_structure_consisting_of_two_paths." class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>) contient deux chemins :

trans-unit.source: C:\Doc Files

seg-source.mrk: C:\Doc Files

target.mrk: C:\Doc Files

trans-unit.source: C:\Templates

seg-source.mrk: C:\Templates

target.mrk: C:\Templates

trans-unit.source: Each path submits to a default action that may have exceptions. This default action is symbolized by an icon at the root of the path.

seg-source.mrk: Each path submits to a default action that may have exceptions.
This default action is symbolized by an icon at the root of the path.

target.mrk: Chaque chemin est soumis à une action par défaut qui peut comporter des exceptions.
Cette action par défaut est symbolisée par une icône à la racine du chemin.

trans-unit.source: C:\Doc Files: Include, user cannot make changes.

seg-source.mrk: C:\Doc Files: Include, user cannot make changes.

target.mrk: C:\Doc Files: Inclure, l'utilisateur ne peut pas apporter de modifications.

trans-unit.source: C:\Templates: Exclude, user cannot make changes.

seg-source.mrk: C:\Templates: Exclude, user cannot make changes.

target.mrk: C:\Templates: Exclure, l'utilisateur ne peut pas apporter de modifications.

trans-unit.source: Both paths contain file categories that are either included in or excluded from protection:

seg-source.mrk: Both paths contain file categories that are either included in or excluded from protection:

target.mrk: Les deux chemins contiennent des catégories de fichiers incluses dans ou exclues de la protection :

trans-unit.source: C:\Doc Files:*.avi, *.docx, *.mp3 Exclude, user cannot make changes.

seg-source.mrk: C:\Doc Files:*.avi, *.docx, *.mp3 Exclude, user cannot make changes.

target.mrk: C:\Doc Fichiers:*.avi, * .docx, *.mp3 Exclure, l'utilisateur ne peut pas apporter de modifications.

trans-unit.source: C:\Templates:*.csv, *.doc, *.docx Include, user cannot make changes.

seg-source.mrk: C:\Templates:*.csv, *.doc, *.docx Include, user cannot make changes.

target.mrk: C:\Templates:*.csv, * .doc, *.docx Inclure, l'utilisateur ne peut pas apporter de modifications.

trans-unit.source: A tree structure consisting of two paths.

seg-source.mrk: A tree structure consisting of two paths.

target.mrk: Une structure en arbre de fichiers composée de deux chemins.

trans-unit.source: Each path submits to a default action. This action may have exceptions and is symbolized by an icon at the root of the path (<MadCap:xref href="#Path_icons_of_server_rules" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: Each path submits to a default action.

This action may have exceptions and is symbolized by an icon at the root of the path (<MadCap:xref href="#Path_icons_of_server_rules" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>).

target.mrk: Chaque chemin est soumis à une action par défaut.

Cette action peut avoir des exceptions et est symbolisée par une icône à la racine du chemin (<MadCap:xref href="#Path_icons_of_server_rules" class="table_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Table</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: Path icons of server rules

seg-source.mrk: Path icons of server rules

target.mrk: Icônes de chemin d'accès des règles du serveur

trans-unit.source: Icon

seg-source.mrk: Icon

target.mrk: Icône

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

target.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: If you add an object from this directory to the excluded or included list, this change will be taken into account by the agent.

seg-source.mrk: If you add an object from this directory to the excluded or included list, this change will be taken into account by the agent.

target.mrk: Si vous ajoutez un objet de ce répertoire à la liste des exclus ou des inclus, cette modification sera prise en compte par l'agent.

trans-unit.source: If you add an object from this directory to the excluded or included list, this change will not be taken into account by the agent.

seg-source.mrk: If you add an object from this directory to the excluded or included list, this change will not be taken into account by the agent.

target.mrk: Si vous ajoutez un objet de ce répertoire à la liste des exclus ou inclus, cette modification ne sera pas prise en compte par l'agent.

trans-unit.source: Objects are not protected.

seg-source.mrk: Objects are not protected.

target.mrk: Les objets ne sont pas protégés.

trans-unit.source: Objects are protected unless the user decides otherwise. In that case, the user specifies which object to include or exclude from protection, <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2023-02-24T15:49:59.7764045+01:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="à reformuler" MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2023-02-24T15:50:04.6036837+01:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">directly on the own machine</MadCap:annotation>.

seg-source.mrk: Objects are protected unless the user decides otherwise.

In that case, the user specifies which object to include or exclude from protection, <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2023-02-24T15:49:59.7764045+01:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="à reformuler" MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2023-02-24T15:50:04.6036837+01:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">directly on the own machine</MadCap:annotation>.

target.mrk: Les objets sont protégés à moins que l'utilisateur n'en décide autrement.

Dans ce cas, l'utilisateur spécifie les objets à inclure ou exclure de la protection, <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2023-02-24T15:49:59.7764045+01:00" MadCap:creator="lisal" MadCap:initials="LI" MadCap:comment="à reformuler" MadCap:editor="lisal" MadCap:editDate="2023-02-24T15:50:04.6036837+01:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">directement sur sa propre machine</MadCap:annotation>.

trans-unit.source: No icon

seg-source.mrk: No icon

target.mrk: Aucune icône

trans-unit.source: Objects are not protected unless the user decides otherwise.

seg-source.mrk: Objects are not protected unless the user decides otherwise.

target.mrk: Les objets ne sont pas protégés à moins que l'utilisateur n'en décide autrement.

trans-unit.source: Consult the Server Rules

seg-source.mrk: Consult the Server Rules

target.mrk: Consulter les règles du serveur

trans-unit.source: You can consult the rules set on the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server that apply to your agent. This can be useful when you define protection on files and folders or exclude certain patterns.

seg-source.mrk: You can consult the rules set on the <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" /> server that apply to your agent.
This can be useful when you define protection on files and folders or exclude certain patterns.

target.mrk: Vous pouvez consulter les règles définies sur le serveur <MadCap:variable name="General.ProductName" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd" />qui s'appliquent à votre agent.
Cela peut s'avérer utile lorsque vous définissez une protection sur des fichiers et des dossiers ou que vous excluez certains modèles.

trans-unit.source: Right-click the icon in the task bar and select .

seg-source.mrk: Right-click the icon in the task bar and select .

target.mrk: Faites un clic droit sur l'icone de l' dans la barre des tâches et sélectionnez.

trans-unit.source: The server rules defined by the administrator are displayed in the left block (<MadCap:xref href="#The_arrow_key_is_used_to_expand_or_collapse_the_tree_structure" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).

seg-source.mrk: The server rules defined by the administrator are displayed in the left block (<MadCap:xref href="#The_arrow_key_is_used_to_expand_or_collapse_the_tree_structure" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).

target.mrk: Les règles du serveur définies par l'administrateur sont affichées dans le bloc de gauche (<MadCap:xref href="#The_arrow_key_is_used_to_expand_or_collapse_the_tree_structure" class="figure_x" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">see Figure</MadCap:xref>).

trans-unit.source: The arrow key is used to expand or collapse the tree structure

seg-source.mrk: The arrow key is used to expand or collapse the tree structure

target.mrk: La touche fléchée est utilisée pour développer ou réduire la structure en arbre
